results.abstract: Y Yevtushenko discusses his impressions of his 5th visit to US; says he plans to spend next 5 yrs in Moscow writing plays, short stories and a big novel; claims he felt snubbed by E J McCarthy, who shared stage with him at Madison Sq Garden poetry reading; Yevtushenko illus

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: UNION OF SOVIET SOCIALIST REPUBLICS BLOC

results.snippet: Yevgeny Yevtushenko, the peripatetic Soviet writer and declaimer of poetry, said yesterday that he was going to give up his travels and his poems to spend the next five years in Moscow writing plays, short stories and "a big confessional novel."
results.lead_paragraph: Yevgeny Yevtushenko, the peripatetic Soviet writer and declaimer of poetry, said yesterday that he was going to give up his travels and his poems to spend the next five years in Moscow writing plays, short stories and "a big confessional novel."
